issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://ynet.co.il](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fynet.co.il) ### Comment > When opening ynet.co.il there is a white overlay on the screen for a couple of seconds after the page finished loading.
